description: This file sets up and performs a vector search on a knowledge base of recipes, utilizing a PostgreSQL vector database and a PDF URL knowledge base.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base loaded from PDF URLs, utilizing vector database for search.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a PostgreSQL vector database connection and operations.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: An enumeration or class defining different search types, including vector search.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base data, with options to recreate and upsert.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a vector-based search query on the database.
